General.Name: Lucky Film Co Ltd
General.Description: Lucky Film Company Limited provides photovoltaic materials, lithium battery materials, medical materials, and imaging materials. It also offers solar battery backplane, lithium-ion battery diaphragm, aluminum-plastic film, medical dry film, industrial flaw detection film, printing materials, color photo paper, plastic-coated paper, information and imaging materials, processing chemicals, X-ray film, phot films, NDT film, and other products. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Baoding, China.
General.Address: No.6 Lekai South Street, Baoding, China, 071054
